string.value: Ask #b#p2060005##k in #b#m230000000##k to make you a saddle.

#p2060005#, after measuring #p1013000#, says that a Dragon Saddle must be custom made to fit #p1013000#. He says he will make you a saddle if you pay for the materials and labor.

#i4000155# #t4000155# #b#c4000155# / 50#k
#i4032474# #t4032474# #b#c4032474# / 1#k
#b10000000 mesos#k
You received a completed saddle from #p2060005#.
Hmm... That is a really strange-looking lizard. It almost looks like a Dragon. Of course I doubt anyone would ride a Dragon! You have a really peculiar mount.
I've only seen people riding birds, pigs, wolves, etc. so I know the saddle sizes of those animals, but I can't even begin to guess at the size of this strange animal. Let me take some measurements.

#b(#p2060005# takes measurements of #p1013000#'s waist, wing span, head size, tail circumference, and more. But why is he measuring the length of his nails? And why is he making him open his mouth?)#k
Hmm. The size of this animal is so different! You're going to have to #bspecial order a saddle#k. Is that okay with you?

I will make a saddle for you if you bring me #b50 #t4000155#s#k and #b1 #t4032474##k, the materials needed to make the saddle. As for the fee... Since this is a really interesting project that I'll be working on for the first time, I'll give a discount and only charge you #b10 million mesos#k.
Bring the materials and the fee, and I'll make the saddle. All of the materials can be found here in #m230000000#. Have a good day!
Existing saddles won't fit this animal. I think the only thing you can do is special order one...
Oh, you've gathered all of the materials needed for the saddle. Will you give them to me along with the fee? I will make your saddle right away!
Here, the completed saddle! In order to protect your bottom from that animal's hard scales, I covered the thick body of the saddle with pearl dust. Doesn't it look beautiful?
Enjoy your saddle and feel free to come back if you lose it. Since I made it once, I should be able to make it again pretty easily.
Still haven't gathered all the materials? I will make you a saddle if you bring me #b50 #t4000155#s#k, #b1 #t4032474##k, and the #bdiscounted fee of 10 million mesos#k.
